body:
"It's so hot to finally see Azusa enjoy sex, don't you think?"

Not really. For her to do it in such an unpleasant way... I’m glad for to have eliminated that guy before

"Well, at least she already knows the truth and is going to face Saito. Hopefully she can be free!"
Id just ukno run away or move away
knowing this is a hypnosis doujin that fat bastard ain't going anywhere and you will be his cock sleeve for rest of your life.
